name: Bible Reference Game
description:
The Bible Reference Game is a fun way to study God's word by matching Scripture verses with their references.

- Contains the entire text of the King James Bible
- 3 Levels of Difficulty: Easy, Medium and Hard
- Choose from the Old Testament, New Testament or Both
- View the context of a verse once the correct answer is selected
- Choose from 5, 10, 20, or 50 questions per game
- Score is calculated after each game
- Verses are randomly loaded providing an almost endless number of game variations
- Record your game results and analyze your performance by book of the Bible
- Share your game results on Facebook
- Play on your iPhone or iPad
